content.description:
Sit start low on a sloppy ledge and crimp, move up and right to a good rail, and shoot to a bad sloper on the lip. Hold tight and shoot back to the left for a jug /sidepull and finish with a fun but interesting topout!

Approach the Bonsai Boulder as per the Rocket Boulder. The Bonsai Boulder will be on the left further away from the river and come before the Rocket Boulder. It is the largest boulder of the boulders around it and has a small bonsai esk tree growing from the top
content.location: This is the right most problem on what we are calling the "Bonsai Boulder"

content.description: start low and right on what we are calling the "Rocket Boulder" move left on the crimpy arete down under the steep section, deadpoint to a great pinch and top out.
content.location:
Hike left after you arrive at the river through broken trail to an obvious arete, this is the rocket boulder.

Downclimb near the start holds
